text.value: Please educate the client on danger signs using the job aids
You cannot select none if you have selected a danger sign!
Is currently experiencing any of these danger signs?
_Refer and accompany to the health facility immediately._
Date cannot be in the future!
Which family planning method is using?
Does know the date of the last menstrual cycle?
What is 's approximate date of last cycle?
When was the start date of 's last menstrual cycle?
_Use the family planning story to educate household members on family planning._
_Refer the woman to go to health facility for family planning service._
_Refer and accompany the woman to the health facility for pregnancy test._
Would like to start using a family planning method?
Tasks will appear when follow up is needed.

Use of family planning;

1. Helps you and your spouse to space the children the way you want.
2. Allows you to have the family size that you can comfortably take care of it.
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Date cannot be in the future!
Date cannot be in the future!
Date cannot be in the future!
Date cannot be in the future!
Confirm ANC clinic attendance from the health passport
Number of visits has to be greater than 0!
What is the total number of ANC visits attended by so far?
Date cannot be in the past!
EDD given in the health facility
Does the mother know the date of the last menstrual cycle?
What is 's approximate date of last cycle?
Date cannot be in the future!
When was the start date of 's last menstrual cycle?
_Refer and accompany expectant mother to go for her ANC clinics in order to ensure that she and her baby are healthy and to plan for her delivery._
Date cannot be in the past!
When is the date of the next ANC visit?
_Confirm all pregnancy details from the health passport._
Why does think she is not pregnant?
kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulira kapenga nkhungu mmaso
Phunzitsani mayi woyembekezera za zizindikilo zowopysa
Musasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha chizindikilo chowopysa
Kodi mai oyembekezera akuwona zizindikiro zoopsa izi?
Kuseka kwa amayi kwa mbali ziwiri
Njiraya kulera ya mapilisi a mphamvu ziwiri
Njira ya kulera ya mphamvu imodzi
Njira ya kulera ya pa nkono
Kodi akugwilitsa ntchito njira yanji yolera?
Kodi akudziwa Tsiku lomwe anasamba komaliza?
Tsiku lomwe 's akuganizira kuti anamaliza nsambo womaliza
Kodi nsambo 's wake womaliza anayamba liti?
_Phunzitsani apa banja pogwilitsa ntchito nkhani yakulera_
_Mutumizeni ku chipatala kuti akalandire thandizo la kulera._
_Pelekezani mai kuchipatala kuti akayezetse ngati ali ndi pakati._
Kodi akufuna kuyamba kutenga njira ya kulera?
Tsiku loyembekezera kuchira lomwe mayi anapatsidwa kuchipatala:
Zotsatira za kafukufuku wa nkhani ya pakati

Kugwiritsa ntchito njira za kulera;

1. Zimakuthandizani inu ndi wokondedwa wanu kuti mukhale ndi ana mwa dongosolo.
2. Zimakuthandizani kuti mukhale ndi banja loti muthe kukwaniritsa kulisamalira.
Kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulira kapenga nkhungu mmaso
_Wonetsetsani kuti mwatumiza tsambali kuti mumalize ntchito iyi._
Tsimikizani za maulendo akusikelo powona bukhu la kuchipatala
Wayenda maulendo angati akusikelo ya amai oyembekezera kufikira pano?
Kodi mai akudziwa Tsiku lomwe anasamba komaliza?
Kodi nsambo wake 's womaliza anayamba liti?
Kodi nsambo wake 's womaliza anayamba liti?
_Mupelekezeni mai kuchipatala kuti akayambe sikelo kuti iye ndi mwana womuyembekezerayo akhale athanzi ndi kukonzekera kukachilira ku chipatala.._
Tsimikizani nkhani ya pakati pa mai kuchokera mu bukhu la kuchipatala

bind.calculate: if(selected(../danger_signs, 'bleeding') or selected(../danger_signs, 'swelling') or selected(../danger_signs, 'fever') or selected(../danger_signs, 'headache_dizziness') or selected(../danger_signs, 'lower_abdominal_pain') or selected(../danger_signs, 'convulsions') or selected(../danger_signs, 'water_bag_breaks'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'constipation') or selected(../danger_signs, 'nausea') or selected(../danger_signs, 'muscle_cramps') or selected(../danger_signs, 'haemorrhoids') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')

bind.relevant: (not(selected(../danger_sign_screening/danger_signs, 'none')) and (count-selected(../danger_sign_screening/danger_signs) >= 1)) or int(../pregnancy_registration/anc_visits) = 0 or (selected(../fp_screening/wants_fp, 'yes') or (selected(../pregnancy_screening/pregnant, 'no') and (int(../fp_screening/lmp_approx) >= 3 or ../fp_screening/weeks_since_lmp > 12))) or int(../nutrition/muac) < 22
